Experimental Validation.Method: Gas permeation tests using Wicke–Kallenbach cells, single gas permeation experiments, XPS analysis, and SEM characterization.
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: H2/CO2 separation factor up to 166, H2 permeance up to 8 × 10^-7 mol m^-2 s^-1 Pa^-1 at elevated temperatures.

Other Information.Additional Info: Nanosheets were prepared via a modified soft-physical exfoliation method and assembled into sub-10 nm-thick membranes. The separation performance improved with increasing coating temperature due to reduced interlayer space.
